data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
The rationale for the currently existing root namespace "Text::" is
    obvious, however, "Wigwam" was chosen as the name for the module
    because "TemplateParser" (T.P.) is not as creative.

    Wigwam differs from other template parsers in that it provides
    greater flexibility (in terms of user extensibility and access to
    complex data structures) than any other parser that we have come
    across.
